review: I am happy with my recent purchase of the amazon fire tv stick, it was very easy to set up and is a great way to stream movies and t,v. shows. it's also a good way to watch movies that are downloaded on my amazon kindle fire hd tablet.

review: Worked fine.  Easy in hookup.  Miniature remote is hard to hold and operate for old hands.

review: Great device! Easy to install, and use!
